mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (USERNAME, EMAIL, PASSWORD_HASH) VALUES (#{username}, #{email}, #{passwordHash})
mapper.select: SELECT U.ID, U.USERNAME, U.EMAIL, U.PASSWORD_HASH, U.CREATED_AT, U.UPDATED_AT, UR.ROLE_ID, R.NAME AS ROLE_NAME FROM USERS U LEFT JOIN USER_ROLES UR ON U.ID = UR.USER_ID LEFT JOIN ROLES R ON UR.ROLE_ID = R.ID
